text: An attorney for the District of Columbia may not retain attorney fees taxed as costs in litigation in which the District of Columbia is a party.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 15-702.

1973 Ed., § 15-702.

DC CODE § 15-702

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)
